name: Polynesian Slasher
description:
Here is the Polynesian Slahser game that came out of a 24h (more like 31h) game jam.

The theme was 'History' so we decided to go with something a little different. We took inpiration from the Polynesian Migration and Exploration eras.

We had a large team of 10 people so things got pretty hectic. However, I had a lot of fun and I loved working with everyone. I hope we can do another game jam sometime.
